# Contributing

When contributing to this repository, please first discuss the change you wish to make via issue,
email, or any other method with the owners of this repository before making a change.

Please note we have a code of conduct, please follow it in all your interactions with the project.

## Pull Request Process

1. Create branches from the `dev` branch (the default).
2. Keep changes focused; separate unrelated fixes into separate PRs.
3. Update documentation and tests when behavior changes.
4. Do not bump versions; maintainers handle releases.
5. PRs require two approvals before merge. If you lack permissions, ask a reviewer to merge.
